All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ANDgate
This gate returns true iff all input values are true.
ANDgateTest
 
BoardLoader
 
BoardSaver
 
BoolGateIndexTuple
Utility class for storing a boolean and a GateIndex.
ButtonPalette
The button palette is a scrollable panel displayed on the right of the main window.
Command
A command wraps a task - like placing a gate in the model - into an object, storing the necessary information to undo and (TODO) redo the task.
ConnectGates
This command wraps the task of connecting two gates in the model of a logic circuits board.
ConstGate
Inherit from this class for gates which have no input gates (TRUEgate and FALSEgate)
Controller
 
Converter
 
FALSEgate
This gate always returns false!
FALSEgateTest
 
Gate
Abstract class for representing a generic logic gate.
GateIndex
Used to for indexing which of the inputs to set in a Gate and on a tile representing a gate in the GUI.
GateTest
 
GateWithIndexTuple
Utility class for storing a Gate with a GateIndex.
ImageStorage
This class maintains a mapping, which allows to get the proper visualization of each gate based on its type.
InfoWindow
A generic scrollable window which only displays a text.
InputGate
Inherit from this class for gates which have one or more input gates.
InputGateTest
 
JUnit_Test_Gates
This class tests the functionality of all gates.
Launcher
 
LogicBoard
 
LogicBoardGUI
The core of the visualization of the model.
LogicBoardMenu
 
LogicBoardTest
 
NANDgate
This gate returns true iff not all input values are true.
NANDgateTest
 
NORgate
This gate returns true iff all input values are false.
NORgateTest
 
NOTgate
This gate returns true iff its input is false.
NOTgateTest
 
ORgate
This gate returns true iff at least one of its input values was treu.
ORgateTest
 
PlaceGateAt
This command wraps the task of adding a gate to the model of a logic circuits board.
PointTupleWithStatus
Utility class for storing two 2D-vectors / points in one object.
PositionCalculator
This is a helper class for converting mouse positions on the GUI to grid position / coordinates in the model, and for checking where the mouse is on an individual tile / gate on the board.
RemoveGateAt
This command wraps the task of removing a gate from the model of a logic circuits board.
ResetBoard
This command wraps the task of removing all gates from the model of a logic circuits board, which will also result in the model telling the GUI to reset.
Status
 
TiledCanvas
This class implements a board with grids ("tiles") on it.
TileType
In order to visualize gates in the Logic Board in the GUI, we identify them using enums of this type.
TRUEgate
 
TRUEgateTest
 
TryToRemoveConnection
This command wraps the task of removing a connection between two gates in a model of a logic circuits board.
Vector2Int
Utility class for 2D-vectors with integer components.
Vector3Int
Utility class for 3D-vectors with integer components.
XORgate
This gate returns true iff one input value is true and the other is false.
XORgateTest
